task.title: Rebuilding the DITA-OT documentation
task.shortdesc: The DITA-OT ships with Ant scripts that enable you to rebuild the toolkit documentation. This is especially helpful if your environment contains plug-ins that integrate additional extension points, messages, or parameters into the toolkit.

info.p:
The target parameter is optional and specifies a transformation type. It takes the following values:
html
htmlhelp
pdf
If you do not specify an Ant target, HTML5 and PDF output is generated.
